item.description:
A PRE- THANKSGIVING

SPECTACULAR

SINGLES-ONLY HAPPY HOUR



Friday, November 13, 2009



An evening filled with: Smiles, Laughter, Excellent Food, Beverages, and Singles Mingling at its very best. (Who knows? You may click with someone and have a date for the Holiday Season. “Guess who’s Coming to Dinner” may be what you say to family and friends!



WHERE: The beautiful LaNotte Restaurant in East Windsor, CT



TIME: 6 to 9 p.m. in our own lavish Banquet Room



One Low Price: Only $20.00 What a Deal!!



The Big Print Details:



$20 ticket price includes: A delicious mouth watering, Italian Inspired Pasta dish, A well blended Crisp Green Salad, Mr. Frank Perdue’s Chicken Teriyaki, crusty and perfectly-seasoned Garlic Bread, ( If may be a good idea to pack a few breath mints with you) other food surprises, and one freshly-printed Bar Ticket -- Good for a Well Drink of your choice, including House Martini, Mixed Drink, House Wine, Domestic Beer.



LIBATION INFORMATION: Happy Hour Pricing on additional cocktails if so you desire, 6 - 8 p.m.

$5 House Martinis, and Well Mixed Drinks, $3 House Wine, $3 Domestic Beer, $4 Imported Beer. After 8p.m. - Regular Bar Pricing.



Don’t miss out on the fun AND entertainment of The Ira!!!!!



Let’s Break the Ice….



A Tradition: The Meet and Greet Singles Line. A 30- Second Introduction!!! Starts at 6 p.m.…… Don’t miss out on this wonderful way to meet people!!!!!!



More Big Print Details:

Location: 17 Thompson Road. East Windsor. So very easy to get to. It is right off the Highway!!!



It is on a Friday!! No work the next day!!! How cool is this?



Please RSVP no later than 9 a.m. on Nov. 9, so the restaurant can determine how much delicious food to prepare.



Ira Wettenstein- 860-604-5792. mistrchrming@aol.com



IMPORTANT: Limited to the first 100 Singles. We always need More Men to meet the wonderful women who attend the Single Events!!!!



Dress to Impress!!!! (Please no stained shirts or pants, sneakers, t-shirts, etc……



Let’s get into the holiday spirit!!!!



HAVE FUN, SMILE OFTEN, AND PARTY OFTEN.



(A mere $1.00 fee to be collected to off set costs)
item.name: The Ira- A Pre Thanksgiving Spectacular Singles Only Happy Hour
